rows.label: tlk43500142_06_msg0001
rows.name:
The whole town seems to know about
the Hr√¶svelgr Mercenaries now.

rows.label: tlk43500142_06_msg0002
rows.name:
That puts you a step above your
predecessor, I reckon.

rows.label: tlk43500142_06_msg0003
rows.name:
In fact, I'd go so far as to say you've
rewritten history for the Merc Group!

rows.label: tlk43500142_06_msg0004
rows.name:
Till now, bosses like me and Vandham
who lead the mercs have never really
been particular about details.

rows.label: tlk43500142_06_msg0005
rows.name:
People always thought of us as a band
of rough, tough hired hands who fight
monsters and do the dirty work.

rows.label: tlk43500142_06_msg0006
rows.name:
But you've been treating every case
with so much care and attention, it's
hard to think that way any more.

rows.label: tlk43500142_06_msg0007
rows.name:
Men, women, and children all feel they
can rely on you. I don't think there's
anyone on Alst quite like that.
